com.xceptance.xlt.common.util.action.data

Class YAMLBasedURLActionDataListBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xceptance.xlt.common.util.action.data.URLActionDataListBuilder
      • com.xceptance.xlt.common.util.action.data.YAMLBasedURLActionDataListBuilder

  • public class YAMLBasedURLActionDataListBuilder
extends URLActionDataListBuilder
    Implementation of the URLActionDataListBuilder for files of type 'YAML'.
    • Takes a file of type yaml and build a List<#URLActionData> from it.
    • The syntax of the file must follow the yaml 1.1 specification.
    • The structure of the data is determined within this class and described in syntax.yml
    • The names of the tags, whose values should be parsed into a URLActionData are also determined here.
    • Since the used yaml parser (SnakeYaml)returns a monstrous #HashMap, this class is quite busy with slaughtering this HashMap in small tasty pieces, doing some nasty type checking and converting, as well as error handling. Therefore the structure and quality of the code is not very charming, but it works.
    • If you want to change the names of the tags, you can do it easily.
    • If you want to change the general structure of the data, you better write a new Builder and think about SRP (Single responsibility principle).
    Author:
    matthias mitterreiter
